name: Jewel Pop: Treasure Island
description:
Jewel Pop : Treasure Island !
Everyone knows submerged treasure around somewhere is worth a fortune.

Knowing it, Joy the otter has made a grand decision to live a much better life than having to live underwater breaking some cheap clam shells.
Now he is on his grand journey in search of the shiny treasure said to be located somewhere totally unowned!

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap on 2 or more jewels with the same color attached together.
• The jewel tiles will descend from atop.
• Break potions with adjacent jewels matching the color to fill the screen with water.
• The jewel tiles underwater tend to ascend.

FEATURES
• Jewel tiles awaiting to be tapped and pop.
• Potions to rise the water level causing the tiles within to ascend.
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Catchy sound effects and soft visual effects

• Designed for iPhone & iPad.

E-MAIL
• contact@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE

Like us on FACEBOOK

NOTES
• This app contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• The app is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Hints and ad free.


Thank you!
